parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "HPL",
"software": [
"HPL",
"PMI",
"Singularity",
"SLURM"
],
"resources": [
"DGX-A100",
"GPUs",
"MPI",
"UCX",
"NVidia NGC",
"Singularity container: nvcr.io/nvidia/hpc-benchmarks:20.10-hpl"
],
"details": {
"requirements": [
"Singularity container: nvcr.io/nvidia/hpc-benchmarks:20.10-hpl",
"MPI implementation: PMI2",
"SLURM for job scheduling",
"DGX-A100 system with NVIDIA A100 GPUs",
"HPL dat files for configuration"
],
"notes": [
"The script assumes a DGX-A100 system with 8 GPUs per node",
"The script mounts the HPL dat files via Singularity",
"The script sets specific options for the HPL run within the container",
"The script uses Slurm environment variables to determine node and GPU configuration"
]
}
}
```
